related.meaning: makan malam, makan larut malam, santapan malam
berdiri terbalik, berdiri di atas kepala

lessons.japanese: 家のない人々は夕立の雨宿りをする場所を探した。
lessons.indonesian: The homeless sought shelter from a shower.

lessons.japanese: バスを待っている間に夕立にあった。
lessons.indonesian: While waiting for the bus, I was caught in a shower.

lessons.japanese: あまり遠くに行かないうちに夕立にあった。
lessons.indonesian: I had not gone very far when I was caught in a shower.

lessons.japanese: ５分も歩いた後、夕立に出会った。
lessons.indonesian: We had already walked five minutes when we were caught in a shower.

lessons.japanese: 夕立にあってびっしょりぬれた。
lessons.indonesian: I was caught in a shower and got drenched to the skin.

lessons.japanese: 私は夕立にあって、ずぶぬれになった。
lessons.indonesian: I was caught in a shower and got wet to the skin.

lessons.japanese: 昨日私は夕立にあった。
lessons.indonesian: Yesterday I was caught in a shower.

lessons.japanese: 今日は夕立があるかもしれない。
lessons.indonesian: We may have a shower today.

lessons.japanese: 家のない人々は夕立の雨宿りをする場所を探した。
lessons.indonesian: The homeless sought shelter from a shower.
